name: Meshtastic (MESH-API)
description: OpenClaw channel plugin for Meshtastic LoRa mesh networks. Bridges OpenClaw to a Meshtastic mesh via a running MESH-API instance â€” send/receive messages, list nodes, relay emergency alerts.
author: mesh-api community

meshApiUrl.description: Base URL of the MESH-API instance

meshApiKey.description: Optional bearer token for MESH-API authentication

agentName.description: Agent name used when sending messages to the mesh

defaultChannel.description: Default Meshtastic channel index for outbound broadcasts

pollEnabled.description: Enable background polling of MESH-API for new mesh messages

pollIntervalSeconds.description: How often (seconds) to poll MESH-API for new messages

forwardEmergency.description: Forward emergency alerts from the mesh to OpenClaw channels

maxMessageLength.description: Max characters per mesh message (longer messages are chunked)

timeoutMs.description: HTTP request timeout in milliseconds for MESH-API calls
